snippet.title: ppL: The Animated Adventures
snippet.description:
ppL: The Animated Adventures is a ᵥₑᵣᵧ hard 2D Platform game. 
ppL gets sent into a magical world. Help him fight dragons, mediocre musicians, beasts, clowns and more.  Game features unique platforming section and boss fights where you have to fight tooth and nail to achieve what no other man has done in his lifetime.

To help us pay for the artists and see more info about the game: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/adventures-of-ppl/ppl-the-animated-adventures

Coming to Steam in 2021.

Trailer by: Venadore
► Twitch:  https://www.twitch.tv/venadore
► Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Venadore


**Gameplay footage is not final**
